biotools.summary: A predictor that could distinguish parallel dimeric and trimeric coiled coils. It uses the most efficient and non-redundant amino acid indices combined with the state-of-the-art machine learning method Random Forest to make the prediction.

bioschemas.name: RFCoil
bioschemas.summary: A predictor that could distinguish parallel dimeric and trimeric coiled coils. It uses the most efficient and non-redundant amino acid indices combined with the state-of-the-art machine learning method Random Forest to make the prediction.
